title: 79/1056/EEC: Commission Decision of 29 November 1979 approving an outline programme for certain Mediterranean areas of France (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 29 November 1979  approving an outline programme for certain Mediterranean areas of France  (Only the French text is authentic)  (79/1056/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The outline programme for Mediterranean regions of France, submitted by the French Government on 6 July 1979 pursuant to Article 4 of Regulation (EEC) No 269/79, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 November 1979.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 38, 14.2.1979, p. 1.
